00017 void MessageManager::sendMessage(int _senderID, int _receiverID, int _message, float _extraInfo)
00018 {
00019   EntityManager* entityMgr;
00020   entityMgr = new EntityManager();
00021   BaseGameEntity* receiver = (BaseGameEntity*)entityMgr->getEntityFromID(_receiverID);
00022   if (receiver == NULL)
00023   {
00024     std::cout<<"Error: No receiver with ID of "<<_receiverID<<" found"<<std::endl;
00025     return;
00026   }
00027   Message message(_senderID, _receiverID, _message, _extraInfo);
00028   send(receiver, message);
00029   delete entityMgr;
00030 }

00033 void MessageManager::send(BaseGameEntity *_receiver, const Message &_message)
00034 {
00035   if (_receiver->handleMessage(_message) == false)
00036   {
00037     std::cout<<"MessageManager::discharge: message could not be handled"<<std::endl;
00038   }
00039 }
